content: a pattern v e lv e t p u l l ov e r by claudia q description this is a simple pullover that is sure to become a wardrobe staple comprised of mainly stockinette the real design is in the subtle ombre effect which can been as subtle or as bright as you like it s perfect when you want to stay cozy and stylish experience level materials intermediate yarn a - knitting for olive merino fingering weight 100% merino 250 m / 273 y per 50 g 4 5 5 5 6 6 7 7 skeins yarn b - isager silk mohair lace weight 70% techniques used kid mohair 30% silk 212m / 232 yd per 25 g long-tail cast on 1 1 1 2 2 2 2 2 skeins working in the round yarn c - isager silk mohair lace weight 70% knitting and purling kid mohair 30% silk 212m / 232 yd per 25 g increasing and decreasing 2 2 2 2 2 3 3 3 skeins working wrap & turn short row yarn d - isager silk mohair lace weight 70% backward loop cast on kid mohair 30% silk 212m / 232 yd per 25 g working with dpns optional 2 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 skeins binding off 1 strand of yarn a and 1 strand of either yarns b c or d are held together throughout pattern needles 3 75 mm us 5 circular needle 16 / 40 cm op- gauge tional 32 / 80 cm or longer for larger sizes and 23 sts & 30 rounds = 4 / 10 cm in stockinette a set of double pointed needles dpns for neck- / stocking stitch in the round on a 4 00 mm band and sleeve cuffs us 6 needle blocked with 2 strands of yarn 4 00 mm us 6 circular needle 24 / 60 cm 32 / held together 80 cm or longer for larger sizes and a set of dou- ble pointed needles dpns or needles required to obtain correct gauge notions sizes 1 stitch marker waste yarn or stitch holders tapestry needle xs s m l xl 2x 3x 4x to be worn with 6 / 15cm positive ease shown in size xs 1 finished measurements bust circumference 36 1/4 40 44 1/4 48 52 1/4 56 60 1/4 64 / 92 102 112 122 133 142 153 163 cm body length to underarm 10 1/2 10 1/2 11 3/4 11 3/4 13 14 15 15 / 27 27 30 30 33 36 38 38 cm sleeve length to underarm 12 12 12 1/2 12 1/2 13 13 1/2 14 14 / 30 30 32 32 33 34 36 36 cm upper arm 12 1/4 13 1/4 14 1/4 15 1/4 16 17 3/4 19 1/4 20 1/2 / 31 34 36 39 41 45 49 52 cm yoke depth 9 1/4 9 3/4 10 1/4 10 3/4 11 1/4 11 3/4 12 1/4 12 3/4
